```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, fig.width=12, fig.height=8)
```


```{r}
library(kableExtra)


setwd("~/")
lakeData<-read.csv("Lake_Info_2020.csv")
lakeInfo<-data.frame(ID<-lakeData$lakeID,name<-lakeData$lakeName, lat<-lakeData$lat, long<-lakeData$long, DOC<-lakeData$DOC..mg.L.)

colnames(lakeInfo)[1] <- "Lake ID"
colnames(lakeInfo)[2] <- "Lake Name"
colnames(lakeInfo)[3] <- "Latitude"
colnames(lakeInfo)[4] <- "Longitude"
colnames(lakeInfo)[5] <- "DOC mg/L"




```

```{r echo=FALSE}

knitr::kable(lakeInfo, format="latex", booktabs=TRUE,
             caption="Capture method common slope test") %>% kable_styling(latex_options="scale_down")

```
